integration.name: APIVoid
integration.description: APIVoid wraps up a number of services such as ipvoid & urlvoid

commands.name: apivoid-ip
commands.description: Returns the reputation and extended context of the IP.

commands.name: apivoid-domain
commands.description: Returns the reputation of the domain.

commands.name: apivoid-url
commands.description: Returns the reputation of the URL.

commands.name: ip
commands.description: Returns the reputation of the IP.

commands.name: domain
commands.description: Returns the reputation of the domain.

commands.name: url
commands.description: Returns the reputation of the URL.

commands.name: apivoid-dns-lookup
commands.description: Gets DNS records of a host.

commands.name: apivoid-ssl-info
commands.description: Get useful SSL information from a remote host

commands.name: apivoid-email-verify
commands.description: Checks if an email address is disposable, if it has MX records, and more.

commands.name: apivoid-threatlog
commands.description: Check if a website is present on ThreatLog database

commands.name: apivoid-parked-domain
commands.description: Detect if a domain (i.e google.com) is actually parked

commands.name: apivoid-domain-age
commands.description: Get the registration date of a domain and the domain age in days

commands.name: apivoid-url-to-image
commands.description: Capture a high-quality screenshot of any website or URL

commands.name: apivoid-url-to-pdf
commands.description: Convert an URL info high-quality and printable PDF document

commands.name: apivoid-url-to-html
commands.description: Get the body of an html page after javascript has been executed

commands.name: apivoid-site-trustworthiness
commands.description: A smart API that accurately checks a website's trustworthiness.
